settings.title: How many days do I have to return?
settings.content: Our standard return policy is 14 days. We are always interested in serving our clients, if you have an issue please contact us by filling out the form below.

settings.title: What do I need to do a return
settings.content:
The product must be in a new or unused condition with as much of the original packaging as you have.

Once the return has been approved we will provide you a label for shipping.

settings.title: Our Guarentee
settings.content: We will refund the cost of the merchandise and shipping charges if the return is a result of our error or defective product.

settings.title: Complete Form to Submit a Return Request
